definitions.title: n.pr.
definitions.body: of 2nd month, = c. April-May, named as month of beginning the temple building; [[בְּחׂדֶשׁ זִו הוּא הַחׂדֶשׁ הַשֵּׁנִי]] 1Ki 6:1 = [[בְּיֶרַח זִ֑ו]] v:1Ki 6:37; LXX B v:1Ki 6:1 has simply e)n mhni\ tw=| deute/rw|, v:1Ki 6:37 (in LXX v:4) e)n mhni\ Neisw=| kai\ tw=| deute/rw| mhni/\ LXX codd. e)n mhni\ Ziou mhni\ tw=| deute/rw|; LXXL (only v:1Ki 6:37) e)n deute/rw| mhni/, e)n mhni\ Ziou;—(si vera l. comp. perh. Aram. [[זִיו]] ziywo0 brightness, freshness, so BAram. Da 2:31 +; cf. Targum [[יֶרַח זִיו נִיחָנַיׇּא]] month of brightness of flowers; As. zîmu (zîvu), Dl:Pr 152 f. cf. Nö:ZMG 1886, 732; Thes al. der. [[זִו]], [[זִיו]] ( = [[זְהִיו]]) fr. [[זהה]] in sense be bright, splendid, etc., cf. Ar. zaha0 increase, thrive (of seed-produce), zahwun a beautiful and bright, or fresh, plant; Aram. [[זְהָא]], adj. [[זׇהוֹהָא]] haughty, proud; zho0 glory, boast, be magnificent; yet cf. Ol:§ 174 ad fin.)
